H0.text: What nationality was Christian Doppler after whom the famous 'effect' is named. German

H3.text: What nationality was Christian Doppler after whom the famous 'effect' is named. Austrian

A4.text: Christian Andreas Doppler was an Austrian mathematician and physicist.

A5.text: Doppler was born in Salzburg (today Austria) in 1803.
